minus.android.support.opengl

Interface GLTextureView.EGLWindowSurfaceFactory

  • Enclosing class:
    GLTextureView

    public static interface GLTextureView.EGLWindowSurfaceFactory
    An interface for customizing the eglCreateWindowSurface and eglDestroySurface calls.

    This interface must be implemented by clients wishing to call GLTextureView.setEGLWindowSurfaceFactory(EGLWindowSurfaceFactory)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
